channel.title: Is there anyway that I can give Owners and Admins separate chat crowns?
channel.description: Read the subject. I do not know how to change this. Please tell me. I have three different crowns. One for mod, one for owner, and one for admin. How do I change it so the Admin has a different one?

item.title: Is there anyway that I can give Owners and Admins separate chat crowns?
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.source: Is there anyway that I can give Owners and Admins separate chat crowns?

item.title: Is there anyway that I can give Owners and Admins separate chat crowns?
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

[quote=“Jingojohn, post:10, topic:353879”][quote author=king gauge link=topic=450176.msg3304398#msg3304398 date=1281557593]

Thanks, I will try it.

This is my section in client.java where mod_icons is located.

for(int l4 = 0; l4 < 2; l4++) aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1219[l4] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(class44_2, "mod_icons", l4); Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(class44_2, "backleft1", 0); aClass15_903 = new Class15(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440, class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1441, method11(0), 0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(0, 0, -32357); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(class44_2, "backleft2", 0);
There is files ‘Modicons 0.png’ ‘Modicons 1.png’ ‘Modicons 2.png’

Please use the search bar next time. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265260.0.html
[/quote]

Please read my post next time. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,450176.0.html[/quote]
I read it, you ar elooking on how to make custom crowns and add them in, this will do that. It will put in custom crowns and change the mod admin and owner crown so they’re all seperate. ow about you try the tutorial and see how it works out.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there anyway that I can give Owners and Admins separate chat crowns?
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

Add the crown icon to the client
Then the code is something like

if (c.playerRights == 3); ShowIcon."Name Of crown";
I’m not sure about the showicon in your client.
But in my old client that is what it was

Read full topic

mod cody:

This is the noobiest question, ADMIN AND OWNER ARE SUPOSED TO HAVE THE SAME GOLD CROWN dam
